title: Today marks the unofficial start of the teen social media ban
description: Today marks the unofficial start of the teen social media ban. Here's everything you need to know.
content:
After more than a year of planning and global scrutiny, the teen social media ban is finally a reality for more than 20 million Australian residents.
While the law officially kicks in on December 10… [+6774 chars]
